content.title: Silicosis Pidit Hita-dhikariyon Hetu Sahayata Yojana
content.details: 'Silicosis Pidit Hita-dhikariyon Hetu Sahayata Yojana' has been started for the laborers working in stone mines in Rajasthan. An assistance scheme has been started for the beneficiaries suffering from silicosis. In which financial assistance will be provided to laborers and workers in case of silicosis or death. Applicants can apply for the assistance scheme to silicosis victims through both online and offline modes.
benefits: In case of suffering from silicosis: ₹1,00,000/-
In case of death of a victim of silicosis: ₹3,00,000/-
eligibility: Those construction workers who are registered with the Board as beneficiaries and are depositing contributions.
The beneficiary is suffering from silicosis as certified by the Pneumoconiosis Medical Board constituted under the Rajasthan Workmen's Compensation (Occupational Diseases) Rules, 1965.
The beneficiary cannot receive silicosis assistance amount from the Rajasthan Environment and Health Care Fund (Rehab).
exclusions: Those workers who work in mines and quarries and on whom The provisions of the Mines Act, 1952 apply and buildings or other construction works not included in the definition of building or other construction work in Section 2 (d) of the Act, will not be eligible to receive assistance from the Board.
documents_required: Certificate regarding silicosis from Pneumoconiosis Medical Board.

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The Silicosis Affected Workers Welfare Scheme is an initiative launched by the Government of Rajasthan to provide financial assistance to workers suffering from silicosis and their families.

faqs.question: What benefits are provided under the scheme?
What happens in silicosis?
faqs.answer: Permanent scarring on the lungs caused by inhaling silica (quart) dust is called silicosis. People have difficulty breathing during exercise, which sometimes turns into shortness of breath even at rest.

faqs.question: How much financial assistance will be provided in the case of death?
faqs.answer: In case of death of a victim of silicosis will get the ₹3,00,000/-

faqs.question: What amount of financial assistance is available to individuals diagnosed with silicosis?
faqs.answer: In case of suffering from silicosis ₹1,00,000/-

faqs.question: What documents are required while applying?
faqs.answer: 1. Copy of beneficiary identity card/booklet. 2. Certificate regarding silicosis from Pneumoconiosis Medical Board. 3. Bank account details.

faqs.question: Can applicant get the same benefits from other schemes also?
faqs.answer: The beneficiary cannot receive silicosis assistance amount from the Rajasthan Environment and Health Care Fund (Rehab).

faqs.question: Is this only applicable in Rajasthan?
faqs.answer: Yes, the scheme is currently limited to Rajasthan. Similar schemes, with varied objectives and components, may be implemented in other states.

faqs.question: How can applicant apply online?
faqs.answer: Applicants have to visit the official portal and follow the steps.
